feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
